name: Rhythymals
description:
The cutesy visual aesthetic of Animal Crossing meets the gameplay and mechanics of Rhythm Heaven Fever! Click, hit space or tap to the beat. Credits: Joe Bevis (Programming) Avneet Sekhon (Programming) Charlotte Walker (Art) Danny Scott (Art) Chloe Tong (Art) Courteney Murphy (Art) Wendy-Rose Onyango (Design)

With special thanks to Oliver Collier and Jade Langton.

Music from the Bean Dreams OST by flashygoodness

Made as part of the Inspired Game Jam hosted by Birmingham City University on 22/06/2022.
